withdrawalText.debit_credit: Accepted credit and debit card types
withdrawalText.debit: Credit card payments are not accepted. Please use a debit card.
withdrawalText.credit: Debit card payments are not accepted. Please use a credit card.

cardDetails.cvcTip: The last 3 digits on the back of the card
cardDetails.amexcvcTip: The last 4 digits after the card number on the front
cardDetails.billingAddressHint: This is the address associated with the card
cardDetails.emailHint: We’ll send your payment confirmation here
cardDetails.emailConfirmation: An email will be sent to:
cardDetails.corporateCreditCardSurchargeMessage: There is a fee of £%s for using a corporate credit card
cardDetails.corporateDebitCardSurchargeMessage: There is a fee of £%s for using a corporate debit card

errorViews.tryAgain: Cancel and go back to try the payment again
errorViews.problem: There was a problem with your payment
errorViews.contactYourBank: No money has been taken from your account. Contact your bank for more details.
errorViews.noMoneyTaken: No money has been taken from your account.
errorViews.sessionExpiredNoMoneyTaken: Your payment session has expired. This may be because you have completed your payment or your session has timed out.
errorViews.toMakeChanges: To make any changes to your payment you’ll need to contact the service.
errorViews.paymentCancelledDescription: The service you’re trying to pay has cancelled your payment. No money has been taken from your account.

authorisation.bankCheckingDetails: Your bank is checking your details
authorisation.extraSteps: You may need to complete some extra verification steps.
authorisation.approvalNeeded: To continue with your payment, we need your bank’s approval.
authorisation.approved: The card details have been approved by the bank.
authorisation.checkingDetailsDescription: Your payment details are being checked.

fieldErrors.summary: The following fields are missing or contain errors

cardholderName.name: name
cardholderName.message: Enter the name as it appears on the card
cardholderName.containsTooManyDigits: Enter the name as it appears on the card
cardholderName.containsSuspectedCVC: Enter the name as it appears on the card

cardNo.name: card number
cardNo.numberIncorrectLength: Card number is not the correct length
cardNo.cardNotSupported: This card type is not accepted

cvc.name: card security code
cvc.message: Enter a valid card security code
cvc.invalidLength: Enter a valid card security code

expiryMonth.name: expiry date
expiryMonth.inThePast: Enter an expiry date in the future

expiryYear.name: expiry year
expiryYear.invalidYear: This expiry year is not a valid

addressLine1.name: address line 1
addressLine1.message: Enter address line 1, typically the building and street
addressLine1.containsTooManyDigits: Enter address line 1, typically the building and street

email.name: email
email.typo: There might be a mistake in the last part of your email address. Select your email address.

addressCountry.name: country or territory
addressCountry.message: Enter a valid country or territory

webPayments.apple: There was an error contacting Apple Pay, please try again
webPayments.failureTitle: There was a problem processing your payment.
webPayments.failureBody: No money has been taken from your account, please try again
